snippet.shortDescription: Photographer, critic, former Chairman of the Union of photographers of Belarus, the author of the original methods and technologies in the field of tubeless photography.

biography.nameWork: Born in Rava-Ruskaya, Lviv region, Ukraine
He was elected Chairman of the Board in the newly created Union of artists of the BSSR (the photo club «Minsk» since 1960-ies)
Published in Minsk the book «Your „green hedgehogs“ », which to this day remains a reference book of numerous lovers of cacti and nerds

workList.nameWork: Participation in all-Union exhibition 'Svema-74' (Diplomas: E. Koszul, V. Lobko) — Shostka
Exhibition of V. Lobko in Grodno
Participation in the second International exhibition of photography (Riga)
Exhibition of Three from Minsk (Three from Minsk). Gotlands Konstmuseum. Visby (Sweden)
Exhibition Photo Manifesto: Contemporary Photography in the USSR. Museum for Contemporary Art, Baltimore, Maryland, USA
The exhibition Fotografie aus Minsk at the gallery «Ifa» in Berlin
The exhibition «Second wave». Collective exhibition — Valery Lobko and his disciples. Minsk
The exhibition «Photography from Minsk: Valery Lobko», Vilnius
A memorial exhibition of photographs by Valery Lobko «the Return... the second Step.» (Minsk)

mapPlace.title: Berlin - Exhibition Fotografie aus Minsk at the gallery «Ifa» 1994
Visby, Sweden - Exhibition of Three from Minsk 1993
Vilnius - the Exhibition «Photography from Minsk: Valery Lobko» 2008
